messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] How do you know?
messages.msgSnippet: Maybe you don t get to know. Maybe you never get to know what going on in their minds. But that s OK. They know. :) And mine learn the same way everyone else
messages.messageBody:
Maybe you don't get to know. Maybe you never get to know what going on in
their minds. But that's OK. They know. :)

And mine learn the same way everyone else does -- sometimes it's very obvious
they are looking something up and wanting to find an answer to a direct
question, sometimes they make a connection days later. Sometimes I know about it
even. :)

Nance


In a message dated 6/24/2004 4:08:10 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com writes:
How *do* kids learn without schooling? What styles of learning are there? How
do you know what your kids know without testing?

Thanks,

Sherri-Lee


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
